entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:30 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:30 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:30 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
